Class EmailService

public inherited sharing class EmailService

Methods for emails service

06/19/2021 Initial version.
08/10/2021 Allows sending notification emails to custom recipients, without notifying default contacts.
08/29/2024 EmailMessage.setHtmlBody(): Added method to set the HTML version of the email.

Methods

public static EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendNotification(
  String notificationTag,
  Id recordId,
  Id accountId
)

sendNotification Sends an email notification related to the recordId.

Parameters:
    notificationTag – tag of the notification as specified in the field EmailNotifications__c.
    recordId – id of the record that will be related to the email.
    accountId – id of the account that will be used to send the notification to its contacts.

Returns:
    EmailMessageResult detailing the result of the send transaction.

public static EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendNotification(
  String notificationTag,
  Id recordId,
  Id accountId,
  Boolean notifyDefaultContacts,
  Map<String, String> recipients
)

sendNotification Sends an email notification related to the recordId.

Parameters:
    notificationTag – tag of the notification as specified in the field EmailNotifications__c.
    recordId – id of the record that will be related to the email.
    accountId – id of the account that will be used to send the notification to its contacts.
    notifyDefaultContacts – true if the default account contacts should be notified.
    recipients – map of recipients who should be (additionally) notified. Each map element should contain the record id or email address and the recipient type (to, cc, bcc)

Returns:
    EmailMessageResult detailing the result of the send transaction.

public static EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendNotification(
  String notificationTag,
  Id recordId,
  Id accountId,
  Map<String, String> recipients
)

sendNotification Sends an email notification related to the recordId.

Parameters:
    notificationTag – tag of the notification as specified in the field EmailNotifications__c.
    recordId – id of the record that will be related to the email.
    accountId – id of the account that will be used to send the notification to its contacts.
    recipients – map of recipients who should be (additionally) notified. Each map element should contain the record id or email address and the recipient type (to, cc, bcc)

Returns:
    EmailMessageResult detailing the result of the send transaction.
